blogPost.excerpt: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
blogPost.body: Chatwoot is an open-source omnichannel communication platform built as an alternative to Intercom, Zendesk etc. Chatwoot helps you to connect email, website live chat, social media handles, WhatsApp etc. and manage all your customer interactions from one place.
blogPost.title: Chatwoot - Open-source customer communication platform
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Chatwoot是一个开源的全渠道沟通平台，作为Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以帮助你连接电子邮件、网站即时聊天、社交媒体手柄、WhatsApp等，从一个地方管理所有的客户互动。
Chatwoot是一個開源的全渠道溝通平臺，作爲Intercom、Zendesk等的替代品。Chatwoot可以幫助你連接電子郵件、網站即時聊天、社交媒體手柄、WhatsApp等，從一個地方管理所有的客戶互動。

previous.excerpt: Mobile remote 1-on-1 coaching powered by video for precision feedback. Work with an elite coach who'll *see* your every workout and provide supportive guidance.
previous.title: System2 - Video-powered 1-on-1 fitness coaching by elite trainers 💪

localize.description: 移动远程1对1教练通过视频提供精准反馈。与精英教练一起工作，他将*看到你的每一次训练，并提供支持性的指导。
localize.tagline: 由精英教练进行视频一对一的健身指导💪。

localize.description: 移動遠程1對1教練通過視頻提供精準反饋。與精英教練一起工作，他將*看到你的每一次訓練，並提供支持性的指導。
localize.tagline: 由精英教練進行視頻一對一的健身指導💪。

next.excerpt: Hasura helps developers and organisations build and ship modern applications & APIs faster by making data instantly accessible over a realtime GraphQL & REST APIs.
next.title: Hasura GraphQL Engine 2.0 - Instant realtime GraphQL for all your data

localize.description: Hasura通过实时的GraphQL和REST API使数据可即时访问，帮助开发者和组织更快地构建和发布现代应用程序和API。
localize.tagline: 为您的所有数据提供即时的实时GraphQL

localize.description: Hasura通過實時的GraphQL和REST API使數據可即時訪問，幫助開發者和組織更快地構建和發佈現代應用程序和API。
localize.tagline: 爲您的所有數據提供即時的實時GraphQL
